title: IT Professional (Microsoft Azure & VOIP Systems)
job_overview:
Overview:
 We are seeking a skilled and reliable IT Professional to provide day-to-day technical support and systems management in a fast-paced work environment. This full-time role requires hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure Admin Centers and VOIP systems. The ideal candidate is proactive, detail-oriented, and has a strong background in IT operations, user support, and account management.

Key Responsibilities:
Provide daily technical support to users, manage user accounts (setup/disable), and handle IT equipment inventory.
Administer Microsoft Azure and VOIP systems, ensuring secure access and smooth operations.
Troubleshoot and resolve hardware, software, and connectivity issues, documenting solutions for future use.

Requirements:
Minimum of 8 years’ experience in IT support or system administration.
Strong experience with Microsoft Azure Admin Centers and VOIP systems.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently.
Highly organized, detail-oriented, and proactive.
Strong communication skills to assist non-technical users effectively.


Work Schedule:
 Full-time (EST business hours)

How to Apply:
 Please submit your resume to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line:
 “ITP- [Your Name]”
